data.eml:eml: Six new species of deep water Ampeliscidae (Crustacea: Amphipoda) from Brazilian Coast

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Valério-Berardo, Maria Teresa (2008): Six new species of deep water Ampeliscidae (Crustacea: Amphipoda) from Brazilian Coast. Zootaxa 1844: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183266
